content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Collection at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) with a drop position at (-15.5, -51.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-15.5, -51.5) intended to collect iron ore
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -51.5) with a pickup position at (-15.5, -51.5) and drop position at (-13.5, -51.5)

### Iron Smelting Facility at Position (62.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (62.0, -53.0) for smelting iron ore
- Burner Inserter at position (61.5, -54.5) with a pickup position at (61.5, -53.5) and drop position at (61.5, -55.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (63.5, -52.5) with a pickup position at (62.5, -52.5) and drop position at (64.5, -52.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (59.5, -52.5) to collect output from the furnace

## ERROR TIPS

### Inventory Management Errors
- Ensure that your inventory has enough space before attempting to harvest resources to prevent inventory overflow errors.

### Entity Retrieval Errors
- Verify the position and existence of entities before attempting to interact with them to avoid errors such as "No entity of type burner-inserter found at the specified position."

### Crafting Errors
- Ensure you have all the necessary ingredients and access to the required crafting machines or furnaces before attempting to craft items like transport belts. Iron plates, for example, need to be smelted in a furnace.

### Connection Errors
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to connect entities like transport belts.

### Inserter Fueling and Source Item Errors
- Regularly check and refuel inserters to prevent them from running out of fuel and ensure they have access to source items to avoid them waiting for source items.
